alert.note: Alert for Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 05 at 9:48AM CDT until November 05 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WHITESIDE...EASTERN JO DAVIESS...CARROLL AND WESTERN STEPHENSON COUNTIES... At 947 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Apple River to Loran to near Penrose, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Warren, Pearl City and Jo Daviess County Fairgrounds around 955 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Waddams Grove, Bolton, Lena and Lake Le-Aqua-na State Park. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
